content: this oversized vest is worked flat from the bottom up in two pieces and seamed armhole and neck edgings are added directly to the vest after seaming **sizes ** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x shown in s size **finished measurements ** bust 39½ 44¼ 47½ 52¼ 55½ 60¼ 63½ 67 71½ length 19 19½ 20 21 21½ 22 23 23¼ 23½ **gauge ** 14 sts x 18 row = 4 st st with larger needle save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns elle by me charlotte 60% acrylic 40% wool 5 29 oz/150g 196yds/180m el7002-20 blush 4 5 5 6 7 7 8 8 9 balls **needles & notions ** us size 10½ 6 5 mm straight us size 9 5 5 mm straight and 16 circular or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle stitch marker stitch holders removable stitch marker elle by me is a contemporary line of yarns designed to empower creative expression and celebrate individuality we believe that luxury is a matter of style rather than money elevate your projects using elle by me s exquisite textures runway-inspired color palettes and unrivaled quality - all available at inclusive price points unleash your inner designer and craft elle-worthy masterpieces that seamlessly blend haute couture with handmade charm with elle by me
